name: queryGetCell
description: Returns data contained in that specific cell

examples.title: The simple querygetcell example
examples.description: Here we've example about querygetcell. We created query using queryNew() then we got the last title column value using querygetCell. If we give row number displays the particular row title value otherwise it displays last row value.

examples.title: The simple querygetcell (getCell) script based example
examples.description: Here we've the example to get particular column(title) value in script syntax
examples.code:
<cfscript>
var myQuery = queryNew("id,title","integer,varchar",[[1,"Charlottes Web"],[3,"The Outsiders"],[4,"Mieko and the Fifth Treasure"]]);
writeOutput(myQuery.getCell('title',2));
</cfscript>
